title: Screen compatibility for image testing purposes only on A1398 and A1502
message:
I'm trying to get a couple screens for testing purposes when troubleshooting back light or image problems only, I understand that the camera connectors vary but I also know that some screens can be used to test a few different models, I just don't know which ones are.

Any help will be greatly appreciated.

title: Screen compatibility for image testing purposes only on A1398 and A1502
